html:
9.3.20  7:07 pm   How are you just so damn funny

      it's not me, it's the world that's funny

9.3.20  6:46 pm   your song slow down has really helped me cope with my overwhelming school work,,, why does that song in particular make me feel the way it does

      because of the song's fast pace

9.3.20  6:37 pm   do you think that the unusual and somewhat random feeling your songs are known for grants you a lot of creative freedom whilst writing them?

      no. if it feels random then that means i screwed up. random feels like nothing

9.3.20  6:02 pm   how do I record loud music with people here

      record quiet music and then turn up the volume in the recording

9.3.20  5:31 pm   What is your favorite song/video/post you've ever made?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

9.3.20  4:36 pm   how the hell do you learn to think and feel at the same time

      with music

9.3.20  4:23 pm   how to deal with stress? 

      how about conquering the universe

9.3.20  4:18 pm   do you feel comfortable with sharing the release date?

     of what

     If yes, when?

9.3.20  4:15 pm   Where's my remote?

      somewhere 'else'

9.3.20  4:10 pm   Help I can't escape the ocean

      how about this

9.3.20  3:02 pm   So I'm currently running for president and do you think people would vote for me if I did the unthinkable, released calamari in all 50 states of America. Would you support me if I did that?

      are you the old guy or the even older guy

9.3.20  2:28 pm   what is a video game?

      a depiction of the real world

9.3.20  2:05 pm   u got any sneak peaks on upcoming songs?

     yes

     everyone asks for sneak peaks on your videos but your songs are what have been keeping me going the past couple months and im gettin pretty desperate over here

9.3.20  2:03 pm   what is your favorite milk

      strange milk

9.3.20  2:02 pm   What's the best type of plant to grow in your opinion? (For any reason.)

      knowledge

9.3.20  1:47 pm   Do you ever feel like making music that doesn't sound like music?

      yes. that is one of the easiest ways to fuel music. the music leaps into action, to get revenge

9.3.20  1:46 pm   what does "holy crap the repeating battery pattern comes from the torpedo fish" mean

      when they invented batteries, it's like a big stack of things. they're all connected together. well i think i found out somewhere that this was inspired by the torpedo fish. i suppose it was pretty exciting to find a link from batteries to nature, because what the fuck is a battery, etc

9.3.20  1:17 pm   why is your music so good

      it deals with some adult situations

9.3.20  12:54 pm   is the universe in the shape of a donut?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

9.3.20  12:46 pm   can i do a rhetorical analysis on you for my writing popular culture college class? 

      ok

9.3.20  12:22 pm   What makes music just so darn popular

      because it actually seems to have all the answers. despite the fact that science has told us clearly that this is impossible

9.3.20  11:03 am   I'd like to write or make a video essay about you and your work--mainly on the way you use surrealism in your animated videos. After looking at this website, I feel there's also an element of surrealism to your persona.
Would you consider yourself a surrealist?

     no. considering themself a surrealist is actualy one of the least surreal things a surrealist can do

     Additionally, how would you define surrealism as a whole?
Thank you!

     doesn't exist. you never heard about it

9.3.20  11:02 am   Thoughts on sitcoms?

      they are easy to watch, because you don't have to laugh. all the laughing is done for you

9.3.20  10:16 am   Any tips on dealing with trauma and anxiety?

      make up a song about it

9.3.20  10:11 am   how are you feeling about your next song?

     pretty good but making songs is almost impossible

     i bet it will be great.

9.3.20  9:55 am   I have a bunch of 45 second long little music progressions and idk if i should try to merge them together to make a song or not. I know how to make transitions and stuff I'm just a bit lost

      in my opinion, they don't necessarily belong together. instead of trying to get them to go together just because you have them, try to get them to each be themselves. if they belong together they will beg for it. you don't need to try to put them together

9.3.20  9:12 am   what are your goals and ambitions? you've said several times that you do nothing but make videos with music all day, what are you hoping to get through that?

      well the thing about making music and videos is, it gets the songs and feelings and ideas i've had, to appear in other people's minds. it helps me share the songs and ideas and feelings i've had

9.3.20  7:29 am   Does Wyoming exist?

      yes. wyoming is one of the first things to ever exist

9.3.20  5:43 am   Why do musical instruments make noise

      to possibly *influence* you

9.3.20  5:20 am   How long will the next song be?

      4 minutes and 10 seconds

9.3.20  3:36 am   what's the secret to writing good basslines

      knowing the song

9.3.20  3:11 am   When does the road end?

      when you stop building it

9.3.20  2:56 am   what do you use to make your videos

      we'll see

9.3.20  2:53 am   How do I sleep?

      impossible. it can't be done

9.3.20  2:34 am   whats the next all-purpose thing that needs to be made

      transporter

9.3.20  2:01 am   What is your favorite song of all time?

      that would be impossible. favorite songs can only exist during a shorter period of time

9.3.20  1:51 am   How does one prove to themself that they are not stupid?

      you could try to save the world

9.3.20  1:26 am   Thoughts on tap water

      that is the official water, from god

9.3.20  12:19 am   Have you ever considered making a full length album?

      yes but i can hopefully do something better than that. if it's songs, then i prefer to do them individually. or use them in something much bigger. an album, seems to be the unhappy middle ground of being technically more than a song but not more enough where it really counts

9.2.20  10:42 pm   i don't know how to make friends what do you recommend 

      you could try to make feature films instead

9.2.20  10:37 pm   What is the purpose of an adventure (may it be life or something else)? Is it to enjoy the journey or to make it to the end. 

      both, and so much more

9.2.20  10:06 pm   what are your aspirations?

      be normal and average, simultaneously

9.2.20  10:04 pm   what are your thoughts on bagels

      it's like meat, but different

9.2.20  9:56 pm   Hey is there anything you can tell us about the making of the synth riff in the mountain escape part of And the Day Goes On?

      just turned it on and played it. if i recall correctly i edited the sound a bit before i played it, i recall playing on a fresh iteration of that sound (a new sound). i think the reason i think that is because i think that sound is named after that video

9.2.20  9:05 pm   How do you cope with sadness?

      write it down

9.2.20  8:32 pm   what is the biggest thing in the world

      tiny things

9.2.20  8:26 pm   do you like grapes

      sort of

9.2.20  7:51 pm   would you want a glow-in-the-dark saxophone?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

9.2.20  7:42 pm   please answer this question with something funny

      nothing is funny

9.2.20  7:28 pm   Whatever happened to Mitt Romney? Haven't seen that guy in a while.

     he's wondering also what happened to you, but what seems to be going on is that the two of you have not been looking at each other
